scripts.hardhat:compile:w: find contracts -iname '*.sol' | entr -cnr npx hardhat compile
scripts.chain: yarn anvil:start & sleep 3; yarn hardhat deploy --network anvil --reset --tags core,arbitrum,periphery,mockup ; yarn hardhat typechain ; wait
scripts.chain:mantle: yarn anvil:start:mantle & sleep 3; yarn hardhat deploy --network anvil_mantle --reset --tags core,mantle,periphery,mockup ; yarn hardhat typechain ; wait
scripts.build: yarn deploy:anvil && yarn hardhat package --typechain-target ethers-v5 --build-dir package-build-v5 --build false
scripts.build:ethers-v6: yarn deploy:anvil && yarn hardhat package --typechain-target ethers-v6 --build-dir package-build-v6 --build false
scripts.deploy:anvil: yarn anvil:start & sleep 3; yarn hardhat deploy --network anvil --reset --tags core,arbitrum,periphery ; yarn anvil:stop
scripts.deploy:anvil_mantle: yarn anvil:start:mantle & sleep 3; yarn hardhat deploy --network anvil_mantle --reset --tags core,mantle,periphery ; yarn anvil:stop
scripts.clean: hardhat clean && rm -rf deployments/anvil && rm -rf docs/out
scripts.hardhat:anvil: dotenv -c staging -- yarn hardhat --network anvil --config hardhat.typechain.config.ts
scripts.hardhat:anvil_mantle: dotenv -c staging -- yarn hardhat --network anvil_mantle --config hardhat.typechain.config.ts
scripts.hardhat:arbitrum_goerli: dotenv -c staging -- yarn hardhat --network arbitrum_goerli --config hardhat.typechain.config.ts
scripts.hardhat:mantle_testnet: dotenv -c staging -- yarn hardhat --network mantle_testnet --config hardhat.typechain.config.ts
scripts.docs: hardhat --config hardhat-docs.config.ts docgen && hardhat --config hardhat-errors-docs.config.ts docgen
